chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k y)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Md0.k = zero : dim
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0
eqc_eqc_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA m k y)
eqc_trans : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y z -> eqc m x z
eqc_symm : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y x
eqc_exd_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> exd m x /\ exd m y
eqc_cA_1_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k x)
eqc_refl : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), exd m x -> eqc m x x
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
eqc_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {eqc m x y} + {~ eqc m x y}
MA0.impls_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> MA0.expo m x y -> impls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
A_1_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> x -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
A_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), y <> x -> A (B m k x) k y = A m k y
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
pred_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k x -> top m k x <> A_1 m k x
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
A_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A_1 (B m k x) j y = A_1 m j y
A_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A (B m k x) j y = A m j y
A_B_1_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A (B_1 m k x) j y = A m j y
A_1_B_1_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) j y = A_1 m j y
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z

```coq
intros m k x y Hinv Heqc.
rewrite <- (eqc_cA_1_r m k x Hinv).
apply eqc_trans with (y := cA_1 m k y).
- apply eqc_symm, eqc_cA_1_r; assumption.
- apply eqc_eqc_cA; assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros m k x y Hinv Heqc. rewrite <- (eqc_cA_1_r m k x Hinv). apply eqc_trans with (y := cA_1 m k y). - apply eqc_symm, eqc_cA_1_r; auto. - apply eqc_eqc_cA; auto.
